entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this morning then 40 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning this evening and ending after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 50 gusting to 70 overnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
